oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Dog tags of 1st Lt. Allen Phillip Francis
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A pair of dog tags, one round, one square, on a knotted cotton tape. Both are similarily marked "ALLEN. P. FRANCIS / LIEUT. / C.A.C. U.S.R. / U. S. A. " The square tag was issued in France to troops who arrived with a single tag. Lt. Allen Phillip Francis served in Battery C, 44th Artillery, Coastal Artillery Corps.
